name: Catastrofix
description:
Catastrofix is a one-versus-one game where players are robot vacuums ! 

The cat in your household cannot resist causing constant havoc. As a loyal, sentient robot vacuum, you must repair the damages made. First, vacuum up the scattered debris and then return to destroyed items to start restoring them.

Don't forget who your real enemy is here, because you may not be the one to complete the reparations...

Make sure to pick up any special items, which can grant you the abilities to best help you, or to even hinder your opponent.

The player whom completes the most repairs wins! 

Created by Team LaSalle Purple: Alexandre Lepage, Jeffrey White-Couture, Théophile Gorisse, and Angeline Siv, whom are third-year video games programming students at Collège LaSalle, as of Jan 2020.

Global Game Jam 2020 - Theme: Repair

Note: due to the nature of the location hosting our Global Game Jam event, this game is in French. Controller-only.
